text: having habits can be a good thing for
example when you drive to work you don't
need to wonder whether you should turn
left or should you turn right because
the road becomes your habit but
sometimes habits can embarrass you and
they can embarrass others there are some
habits that can affect your
relationships without you knowing it so
like it or not bad habits are bad for
you especially socially it can turn
people off and it can turn people away
from you while some bad habits are
harder to quit than others it doesn't
change the fact that you need to get rid
of them and that's why I've made the
session for you so in this session I
have 20 bad habits there are examples of
bad social etiquette that you need to
get rid of as soon as possible so my
name is Michelle and you can watch this
full session on skillopedia by clicking
over here or finding the link in the
description box so see you there on
skillopedia the place to learn skills
for the real world
